body_html:
I've pushed a new commit that isolates the eigen_version and eigen_sha256 in the bazel config and adds some code to the cmake and make builds to extract those values.
I've used built-in tools in cmake to make sure that the config stays portable.
body_text:
I've pushed a new commit that isolates the eigen_version and eigen_sha256 in the bazel config and adds some code to the cmake and make builds to extract those values.
I've used built-in tools in cmake to make sure that the config stays portable.
body:
I've pushed a new commit that isolates the `eigen_version` and `eigen_sha256` in the bazel config and adds some code to the cmake and make builds to extract those values.
I've used built-in tools in cmake to make sure that the config stays portable.
